features: 【Use safe silicon】The water bottle is BPA free and odorless, made of BPA-free food-grade organic silicone, passed LFGB, SGS and as obtained FDA certification, to ensure safe drinking, no PVC, latex, phthalate and plastic smell, etc. odor. ❤It is safe and hygienic, because it uses a food-grade liquid silicone bottle and a food-grade plastic cap,children can also use it with confidence.

【LEAK-PROOF AND EASY-TO-CLEAN】The patented sealing screw cap is used to eliminate leakage and splashing and effectively prevent the bottle from accidentally opening. The wide-mouth design makes it easier to clean the inside of the collapsible soft water container or add ice or lemon to it. ❤When using for the first time, it is recommended to soak in boiling water for 10 minutes for thorough cleaning.

【Cold and heat resistance】This product has excellent heat resistance and can withstand temperatures from -50 to 200°C. It has leak-proof and impact-resistant properties and is very suitable for all activities and sports. Even if it is squeezed or pushed, it will be tightly sealed. Even if you put it in a backpack or computer bag, it will not leak.❤We do not recommend using it in liquids higher than 158°F (70°C) to avoid hot hands.

【Lightweight and convenient】The 20oz(600mL) portable silicone bottle is a foldable type. It takes advantage of the characteristics of soft silicone and can be folded compactly after drinking, making it easy to carry.❤Allows you to hydrate your body at any time and any where.
Variety of Sizes: Collapsible water bottles come in various sizes to suit different hydration needs, from smaller capacities for short trips to larger ones for all-day use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tired of bulky water bottles leaking in your bags? A lot of people are always on-the-go, raising the need for more portable and convenient items. Since food and water are basic human necessities, packaged food and bottled beverages have become a staple for busy individuals. We usually toss our unnecessarily large water bottles in our bags and think nothing of it. By the time lunch rolls around, you open your backpack, tote bag or designer purse, and find out you’ve created a lake right under your nose. Keep your things safe and dry with the help of a Our Collapsible Silicone Water Bottle!

The Best Collapsible Water Bottles That Won't Take up Space in Your Bag Product Features Our bottles are made of BPA-free food-grade silicone. Our bottles are dishwasher safe and resistant to a temperature range of -50°C to 200°C. The bottles are airtight and easy to fold reducing the bottle’s size by over 80%. The cylindrical shape of the bottle makes it sturdy and easy to hold. Is designed for easier carrying of the bottle on the backpack. Note: Natural silicone products may have a slight odor or taste present. 1) To remove it, add a small baking soda and fill the bottle with hot water.2) Let it sit for 2 hours or more;3) Then pour out the water and wash thoroughly. Capacity:600ml(20.2oz) Weight:135g Materials:PP,food-grade silica gel Color:Green/Grey/Rose-red/Blue Product Size: Size:22cm bottle body, 2.5cm bottle cap, 7cm cup diameter Unfold: 7*7*24.5cm; Fold: 7*7*5cm Packing size: 8*8*7cm Duration: 3years or above Package Included: 1 * Water Bottle ; 1 * Packing Box

1.HEALTHY & SAFE MATERIAL Made of thick and flexible BPA-free silicone, the reusable water bottle maintains its sturdy feel for a comfortable drinking experience, made of 100% food-grade materials; Free of BPA, BPS, PVC, phthalates, lead, latex, and other harmful leaching chemicals. enough to survive accidental drops,also makes it safe to drink 2.PORTABLE sturdy and comfortable to drink from; rolls up for compact travel; loops around your wrist for easy carry; attaches to your bag for quick access. It conveniently rolls up or squashes down when space is tight. Attached multi-function strap secures the flask in its folded position and makes it easy to carry when you're on-the-go. Freezable, heat resistantFlexible, shatterproof siliconeErgonomic concave-convex design, easy to grasp 3.Leak Proof Guaranteed The patented screw cap design ensures a secure, airtight seal when closed and controlled intake when open. In between sips, the hinged cap doubles as a hygienic spout cover, preventing from getting onto the mouth piece and into your drink--handy for when traveling, spending time outdoors, at the gym, or for kids at school. 100% leak-proof design to prevent annoying spillsWide mouth lid makes cleaning easierConvenient to drink water or add ice cubes and lemon slice

Daily/Indoor: Daily/Indoor: This bottle is all you need to keep you hydrated while on-the-go, portable and the right size for you to hold your drinkable water for the day.Perfect choice for travelers who often catch flights. Motion: Motion: They usually offer enough of a capacity for the liquid to facilitate the average workout session and they’re portable enough to be stored in a backpack or gym bag. Travel/Outdoor: Travel/Outdoor: For outdoor sports such as hiking,biking,running,the lightweight & collapsible design allows you to exercise outdoors without having to make room for it in your backpack like regular water bottle needs.It even can be fit in in your Pants pockets. EASY TO CARRY, COMFORTABLE TO USE Foldable for traveling, hiking, and camping. Easy to lug around with ergonomic carry strap. 100% leak-proof design to prevent annoying spills. Hygienic spout cover keeps out grime and germs. Wide mouth lid makes it easy to add ice and clean. Daily Lift Motion Travel Hiking

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved my water bottle and bought one for my sister
reviews.reviewText: I love this water bottle because once you are finished, you can collapse it and put it away. It is also very lightweight.I have identified one weakness of this bottle, in addition to the chemical smell, which does go away with a good green tea soak and use over time. The bottle leaks around the top rim when it is full or the bottle is squeezed and the ring at the top bends. Also, when drinking from the bottle, if you squeeze too hard, the water will gush out. It is very easy to figure all of this out after you use it a few times so that you adapt and avoid creating problems.If dropped, this bottle won't crack or break. I prefer this bottle over rigid plastic bottles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Leakproof and great for travel but after 7 months...
reviews.reviewText: I've used this for several trips over the last 7 months,. I have never had a problem with it leaking. It is perfect for folding up when you don't need it. The hardest thing to get used to is the soft walls, and remembering to tell other people when they fill it for you! My only disappointment is the discoloration on the interior of the bottle- it looks like it is going moldy, although I do know it is perfectly clean as I have cleaned it by boiling it in water. Water still tastes fine in it but it looks awful and I just can't get past that now :-(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective, Space-saving option!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this before our last family trip so we could take it through airport security and fill it up for the plane ride. It worked great! It's rubbery so it doesn't stand up on its own very well when it's full of water, but I also don't think it leaked at all the whole time we used it so that's not a deal-breaker. It's easy to fold up and secure when you're done using it, and I like that it was small and easy to pack. It was great to have on hand. I think I will order a couple more before our next trip. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Strap broke after 2 days
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a 2-week vacation where I knew we'd be doing a lot of walking, and space in my suitcase was limited. First, it took awhile to get the smell out, and it never completely went away. The instructions gave two methods - boiling it in water or filling it with green tea. I boiled it twice and soaked it in green tea for several hours, but still a slight odor/taste remained. Second, you have to be careful when filling and drinking from it. It's made of soft rubber that's easily squeezed or collapsed. Still, I would have given it 4 stars, except that after only two days, the "durable carry strap" broke. Since that's also the elastic piece that keeps it folded when not in use, after that it became like any other water bottle - except easily squeezed/spilled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for amusement parks
reviews.reviewText: We have season passes at an amusement park and have the drink plan with the disposable cup. Of course they do not come with a lid, so you have to drink the whole thing immediately. This cup is perfect to pour the drink in and carry around without leaking! Plus being able to fold down is super handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Did the job but, nothing special about this product
reviews.reviewText: Ordered this to take with me to the ERAS Tour concert and it fit perfectly in my stadium approved clear bag. Once we were in, I was able to open it up and fill with water. Which stayed fresh for the whole concert. I followed the instructions on how to clean the bottle, but I used two tea bags and the trick worked! I've also tested the water bottle by freezing it and it works well. However, the lid doesn't fit quite as well as it should so, once the ice defrosts, it does leak. It's not a perfect bottle but, it does the job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great collapsable bottle.
reviews.reviewText: I take it to work and I can refill it easily. No spills when I placed the additive in the water and shook it. Very convenient. I bought it for traveling and it is an awesome addition to my travel bag. Folds easily when empty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to fold and place into your bag when traveling or at a music festival. A but heavy when you fill it with water if you plan on holding it for a long time tho. A weird taste when you first use it, wash it thoroughly
Fiel a la descripción del producto aún no la uso llego muy rápido

reviews.reviewTitle: Cap broke on the second use. Stay away from this product
reviews.reviewText: I have never reviewed a product on Amazon ever, but this one was so bad I had to. Second time I try to close the bottle cap, and it BROKE RIGHT AWAY. Making my purchase useless. I can't ask for a refund now, but buyers beware - please stay away from this product
When you hold the bottle then open it water spills out. There is no way around this problem.
It collapses very nicely and is great for travelling but the lid leaks and I can't get the taste residue out of it no matter what I wash it with.
